name: Stepwise
description:
This is a very short game inspired by the Long Earth series of books, written by Terry Pratchett and Stephen Baxter.

Use arrow keys to move and reach the red exit square.

I created this game for the under 4mb game jam. However the dlls that you have to package the game with boosts the size well over that so I couldn't submit it! I thought I'd upload it anyway as it is my first game created in Love2d.
